20110107162053.000|20110107162055.000|CC1|      DOCTOR ABOUT PRISTIQ速,    
20110107162055.000|20110107162055.000|CC1|     A PRESCRIPTION MEDICINE    
20110107162055.000|20110107162058.000|CC1|   PROVEN TO TREAT DEPRESSION.  
20110107162058.000|20110107162059.000|CC1|    PRISTIQ IS THOUGHT TO WORK  
20110107162059.000|20110107162059.000|CC1|     BY AFFECTING THE LEVELS    
20110107162059.000|20110107162101.000|CC1|  OF TWO CHEMICALS IN THE BRAIN,
20110107162101.000|20110107162103.000|CC1|  SEROTONIN AND NOREPINEPHRINE. 
20110107162103.000|20110107162103.000|CC1|   TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY  
20110107162103.000|20110107162105.000|CC1|   IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS   
20110107162105.000|20110107162105.000|CC1|   OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES  
20110107162105.000|20110107162107.000|CC1|        IN MOOD, BEHAVIOR,      
20110107162107.000|20110107162108.000|CC1|     OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.    
20110107162108.000|20110107162108.000|CC1|   ANTIDEPRESSANTS CAN INCREASE 
20110107162108.000|20110107162110.000|CC1|        SUICIDAL THOUGHTS       
20110107162110.000|20110107162110.000|CC1|    AND BEHAVIORS IN CHILDREN,  
20110107162110.000|20110107162113.000|CC1|     TEENS AND YOUNG ADULTS.    
20110107162113.000|20110107162113.000|CC1|     PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED    
20110107162113.000|20110107162115.000|CC1|     FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.     
20110107162115.000|20110107162117.000|CC1| DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.
20110107162117.000|20110107162117.000|CC1|          TAKING PRISTIQ        
20110107162117.000|20110107162119.000|CC1|    WITH NSAID PAIN RELIEVERS,  
20110107162119.000|20110107162119.000|CC1|   ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS   
20110107162119.000|20110107162122.000|CC1|   MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.  
20110107162122.000|20110107162122.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20110107162122.000|20110107162124.000|CC1|   ABOUT ALL YOUR MEDICATIONS,  
20110107162124.000|20110107162125.000|CC1|  INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE, 
20110107162125.000|20110107162125.000|CC1|      TO AVOID A POTENTIALLY    
20110107162125.000|20110107162127.000|CC1|   LIFE-THREATENING CONDITION.  
20110107162127.000|20110107162127.000|CC1|   PRISTIQ MAY CAUSE OR WORSEN  
20110107162127.000|20110107162130.000|CC1|       HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE,     
20110107162130.000|20110107162131.000|CC1|  HIGH CHOLESTEROL, OR GLAUCOMA.
